bioAsHtml: Jean-Remi Desjardins made his first contribution to the Scala compiler 5 years ago, shortly after adopting Scala as a better version of Java. Since then, he has become more and more involved in the pure functional side of Scala, currently writing advanced Haskell in Scala at Slamdata. Jean-Remi has made many contributions to some well-known libraries in the Scala ecosystem such as scalaz and fs2. He is one of the maintainers of the http4s library.
